name: Zombie Breakout (Wang Leng, IanTeo, AngShiYa)
description:
A zombie apocalypse is happening, and your village is currently under attack by zombies. The villagers are panicking and are out of control, just like the zombies!

Since the villagers are in high-panic mode and unable to follow instructions, your goal, as the builder, is to use objects to block dangerous path for your villagers and lead them to the escape gate. For the zombies, it is the opposite; throw them into the water instead of leading them to the gate!

Have fun!

Controls:

W or ↑: Move forward
S or ↓: Move backward
A or ←: Rotate anti-clockwise
D or →: Rotate clockwise
Spacebar: Interact with objects (Pick up/Put down)

Made by:
  • Ang Shi Ya - Programmer, Artist
  • Ian Teo - Programmer, Game Designer
  • Wang Leng - Programmer, Music

Sounds were adapted from licensed sounds, so we are not participating in the audio category.
